thread.title: Val Johnson

author: Val Johnson
title: Val Johnson
text:
Hi Everyone,"Trusted Housesitters" is an awsome housesitting website.
The site is easy to navigate, from my perspective as someone looking for housesitting assignments, and I am sure it would also be the case if you were a home owner seeking someone to look after your home and pets.
I like the fact that it is global and you can housesit anywhere in the world.
I highly and totally recommend and have recommended "Trusted Housesitters" to anyone who is looking to housesit or wanting someone trustworthy in their home with their pets.
Val Johnson
